到達目標:
Students will be able to understand how a living language such as English is impacted by real events.
Students will be able to understand the key events in the evolution of the English language.
特記事項:
この授業を履修するには、事前にレベル認定の申請が必要です。詳細は備考欄を確認してください。

本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業の概要・背景: This course will show how English grew from a German dialect into the modern language it is today. This is a surprisingly interesting story, with a lot of influential people who made important contributions. If you have ever wondered why the spelling and pronunciation of English seem so loosely related, this course will explain how it happened.
